oai_dc:dc.dc:title: [British attack upon Ticonderoga, July 7 & 8, 1758].
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Ticonderoga, Battle of, N.Y., 1758--Maps, Manuscript.; Manuscript maps.; Maps shelf.; Gage Maps.; Brun Guide.; Ticonderoga (N.Y.)--Maps, Manuscript.; George, Lake (N.Y. : Lake)--Maps, Manuscript.; New York (State)--Maps, Manuscript.; United States--History--French and Indian War, 1754-1763--Maps, Manuscript.; Rivez, Charles.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Shows movements of British troops from landing to the battle before Ticonderoga.; Charles Rivez suggested as possible author.
